message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit your business. We are offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This opportunity is exclusive to you, and we are confident it will meet your needs and expectations.

Alice, thank you for the offer. While your product is appealing, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm prepared to offer $850,000 for it.  This price is fair for both of us, and allows for a mutually beneficial deal.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. I am now offering the product for $900,000. This price reflects the value we place on the transaction while remaining competitive.
